body:
• Most KV stores have little to no functionality beyond storage and retrieval via keys
  • M/R extends the functionality of Riak so that data can be queried in a more powerful way
  • Why M/R?
    • M/R is about moving the computation to the data
    • Suits Riak!
    • Parallelism / concurrent Map phase
    • Eric Meijer - "The math says it has to be that way!" (YOW Conf 2010)
